message: Let's be fair and take the bigger part!
My turn to be fair. This is a good offer, take it before inflation eats your share!
You didn't take my first offer, now I'm a bit less generous
The clock is ticking, Alice! Let's be reasonable and split it almost down the middle. This deal saves us both from inflation.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both walk away with a decent share before inflation eats away at it any further.
